sub_title: International Business, Finance, English and Mandarin proficiency.
summary:
I have a solid background in Finance (MSc in Finance & CMA degree), Corporate Finance (KPMG), Banking (Rabobank China) and international working experience. Made a move into Financial management of a medium sized enterprise (Shanghai based) early 2021. My most recent project was the set up of Anton Paar the Netherlands where I am responsible for Finance and Operations. My time in China has had a profound impact and greatly increased my resilience, perseverance and goal orientation. Besides, I am fluent in English (CEF C1) and speak basic Chinese (CEF B2).

Colleagues regard me as a professional with a high level of energy who can enthuse, achieve results and has a can-do hands-on mentality. They say my open style and approach is very effective in establishing relationships.

education.degree_name: Fulltime language student - Standard Chinese 普通话

school.name: The Chinese University of Hong Kong

profile_positions.description:
Managementteam member.

I am responsible for the Finance, HR and the entire backoffice operations at Anton Paar Netherlands. We were founded in October 2022 and as of January our new company merged with the existing operations of Anton Paar in the Netherlands.

My main goals is the smooth post-merger integration of the operations and the training of the newly hired back office team (4 FTE – 3 direct reports). Integrating old and new processes whilst maintaining high client service and client support. Our back offices support the organisation (sales and service) with all matters related to Finance, Logistics, HR and IT. 

Anton Paar GmbH develops, produces and distributes highly accurate laboratory instruments and process measuring systems, and provides custom-tailored automation and robotic solutions. It is the world leader in the measurement of density, concentration and CO2 and the field of rheometry.

Anton Paar Netherlands B.V. (>20FTE) is a start-up subsidiary of Anton Paar GmbH operating in the Netherlands. It was founded in October 2022 in Breda. Anton Paar Netherlands provides sales & marketing, technical application support and customer service to users throughout our service area.
profile_positions.title: Head of Operations & Finance

profile_positions.description:
Managementteam member.

I am responsible for the Finance, Logistics and IT departments of Anton Paar China. My main goals is the smooth support of the organisation (sales and service) with all matters related to Finance, Logistics and IT. While simultaneously providing guidance, knowledge and a well-managed working environment for my team (~22FTE 3 direct reports).

Anton Paar GmbH develops, produces and distributes highly accurate laboratory instruments and process measuring systems, and provides custom-tailored automation and robotic solutions. It is the world leader in the measurement of density, concentration and CO2 and the field of rheometry.

Anton Paar (Shanghai) Trading Co., Ltd. (>200FTE) is the top tier subsidiary of Anton Paar GmbH. It was founded in 2006 in Shanghai. Anton Paar China provides sales & marketing, technical application support and customer service to users throughout the whole of China.
profile_positions.title: Head of Administration & Finance

profile_positions.description:
Mid-Career break to focus on learning and development with the end goal of realising a switch of industry and fast forward my career:
- Chinese language studies, Sichuan University, Chengdu China (September 2019 - June 2020)
- Certified Management Accounting Degree, IMA, Taipei (July 2020 - October 2020)

In addition, I spend valuable time on my big passion for hiking (Everest Base Camp, Tibet / Marti Himal Annapurna, Nepal and several smaller hikes).
profile_positions.title: Mid-Career Break

profile_positions.description:
Assisted CEO/ CFO (the client) with cash flow planning, working capital management solutions, capital budgeting, FX issues and capital structuring. Serving MNC’s and SME’s in a multitude of sectors like food, high tech and trade. Acted as deal captain internally and strategic partner externally. Had ultimate client responsibility for my clients in China. Business Development role in China.
--> Client details & Deal size: international listed and private companies in China. Deal value USD 1mln- USD 150mln. 
--> Products: Term Loans, Export Finance, Supplier Finance, Treasury products, 外保内贷, cash management.
--> Key success competencies: resilience, determination, flexibility, cross cultural communication, building relationships
--> Main accomplishment: new business development in high tech sector. Deep sell existing client in food sector.
profile_positions.title: Relationship Manager (Associate Director) China

profile_positions.description:
As of Januari 1st I will start in my new role as Relationshipmanager for Rabobank Shanghai (China) and move abroad.

In preperation of my new position I will be steering my energy to getting to know our International Business Advisory department and all stakeholders involved.
profile_positions.title: International Business Advisory Rabobank China

profile_positions.description:
Rabobank International traineeship (Young Professional Program):
a special high potential program which aims to turn its candidates in all round senior bankers in the corporate client segment within 6 years. I follow in-depth job related and soft skill training whilst being guided by external career coaches.

Rabobank International Credit Analyst:
Assisted the CFO’s with ratio analysis, sector knowledge and as general strategic sparring partner providing insight with numbers. Tasks encompassed credit risk analysis, project and risk management, portfolio analysis. 
--> Client details & Deal size:  food and non food franchise sector. Deal value USD 1mln– USD 150mln.
--> Main accomplishment: increasing sector knowledge by means of integral benchmarking and ratio analysis by construction of a benchmarking model and database (VBA) reducing average time spend per deal by three hours.
profile_positions.title: Credit Analyst Rabobank

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for the financial analysis, modelling and report writing for our client's engagements. Valuations encompasses in debt financial analysis as well as judgement on market movements and the companies business model and long term outlook. Modeling skills were essential as to conduct sound sensitivity analysis on the valuation outcomes. The job is deal driven which fitted my high energy level. I worked for listed as well as privately held companies

Engagements encompassed following fields in finance:
-Business Valuations
-Strategic Valuations
-Portfolio Valuations
-IP Valuations
-Purchase Price Allocation
-Goodwill Impairment testing
-Modelling
profile_positions.title: Executive - KPMG Corporate Finance Valuations

volunteer_experiences.description:
It is KPMG's young professional oranization (Connect) goal to increase social interaction between all (young) associates of KPMG. In addition we promote education, personal development and sports.
I enjoy feeling part of the whole organization and broadening my social network. As such I joined shortly after my first working day at KPMG. I was responsible for following events:
- Golf clinic 2012
- Golf clinic 2013

The KONGSI foundation is envolved in commercial contracts and real-estate renovation with the goal of providing sustainable Student housing. Yearly budget of the foundation is abouwt EUR 60k waith a real-estate value of approximately 1.5mln. 
- I was responsoble for drafting the balance sheet and income statements as wel as commercial contracts, debtor administration etc.
